20101229023309.000|20101229023310.000|CC1|INCLUDING CHILDREN, WERE TAKEN  
20101229023311.000|20101229023311.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:33:00 of 1:00:00
20101229023310.000|20101229023311.000|CC1|TO LOCAL HOSPITALS WITH         
20101229023311.000|20101229023313.000|CC1|INJURIES.                       
20101229023313.000|20101229023315.000|CC1|AT THE TIME, AN ESTIMATED 220   
20101229023315.000|20101229023317.000|CC1|SKIERS WERE ON THE SPILLWAY EAST
20101229023317.000|20101229023318.000|CC1|LIFT MAKING THEIR WAY UP THE    
20101229023318.000|20101229023321.000|CC1|2,800-FOOT PEAK.                
20101229023321.000|20101229023322.000|CC1|WORKERS USED A PULLEY-LIKE      
20101229023322.000|20101229023324.000|CC1|SYSTEM TO LOWER THE SKIERS WHO  
20101229023324.000|20101229023326.000|CC1|WERE STUCK ON THE LIFT.         
20101229023326.000|20101229023327.000|CC1|SUGARLOAF AUTHORITIES SAY THAT  
20101229023327.000|20101229023328.000|CC1|THE HIGH WINDS MAY HAVE BEEN A  
20101229023328.000|20101229023330.000|CC1|CONTRIBUTING FACTOR TO THE      
20101229023330.000|20101229023331.000|CC1|DERAILMENT, BUT THE INCIDENT IS 
20101229023331.000|20101229023334.000|CC1|STILL UNDER INVESTIGATION.      
20101229023334.000|20101229023335.000|CC1|THEY INSIST THAT THEIR LIFTS ARE
20101229023335.000|20101229023337.000|CC1|ROUTINELY INSPECTED FOR SAFETY, 
20101229023337.000|20101229023339.000|CC1|BUT EYEWITNESS ACCOUNTS POINT TO
20101229023339.000|20101229023340.000|CC1|POSSIBLE EQUIPMENT FAILURE NOT  
20101229023340.000|20101229023342.000|CC1|THE WEATHER.                    
20101229023342.000|20101229023344.000|CC1|>> IT SEEMED AS THOUGH THE      
20101229023344.000|20101229023345.000|CC1|WHEELS BENT SO THE WIRE CAME OFF
20101229023345.000|20101229023347.000|CC1|AND THAT'S WHAT CAUSED THE CHAIR
20101229023347.000|20101229023348.000|CC1|LIFTS TO DROP.                  
20101229023348.000|20101229023350.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE 35-YEAR-OLD    
20101229023350.000|20101229023352.000|CC1|LIFT RELIES ON CLUSTERS OF      
20101229023352.000|20101229023354.000|CC1|WHEELS TO MOVE THE CHAIRS ALONG 
20101229023354.000|20101229023356.000|CC1|A 4,000 FOOT CABLE AT A SPEED OF
20101229023356.000|20101229023358.000|CC1|500 FEET PER MINUTE.            
20101229023358.000|20101229023400.000|CC1|SKIERS SAY ONE OF THOSE WHEELS  
20101229023400.000|20101229023403.000|CC1|BROKE CAUSING THE CABLE HOLDING 
20101229023403.000|20101229023404.000|CC1|UP A SECTION OF TEN TO 12 CHAIRS
20101229023404.000|20101229023406.000|CC1|TO SUDDENLY DROP.               
20101229023406.000|20101229023408.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO SUGARLOAF'S WEB    
20101229023408.000|20101229023409.000|CC1|SITE, THE 35-YEAR-OLD SPILLWAY  
20101229023409.000|20101229023411.000|CC1|EAST CHAIR LIFT WAS SET TO BE   
20101229023411.000|20101229023413.000|CC1|THE FIRST PRIORITY IN A TEN-YEAR
20101229023413.000|20101229023413.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 0:34:00 of 1:00:00
20101229023413.000|20101229023414.000|CC1|LIFT REPLACEMENT PLAN BECAUSE   
20101229023414.000|20101229023416.000|CC1|THE SPILLWAY TRAIL IS A HIGH    
20101229023416.000|20101229023418.000|CC1|TRAFFIC LIFT AND A CRITICAL     
20101229023418.000|20101229023419.000|CC1|HIGHWAY FOR SKIERS.

20101229023422.000|20101229023423.000|CC1|KNOW WHETHER THAT MODERNIZATION 
20101229023423.000|20101229023425.000|CC1|PLAN COULD HAVE PREVENTED       
20101229023425.000|20101229023427.000|CC1|TODAY'S MOUNTAINSIDE DRAMA.     
20101229023427.000|20101229023429.000|CC1|SETH DOANE, CBS NEWS, NEW YORK. 
20101229023429.000|20101229023431.000|CC1|>> Smith: NOW TO THE ECONOMY.
